name: Hello world
content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><scxml     datamodel="ecmascript"    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/07/scxml"    version="1.0">    <datamodel>        <data id="x"/>    </datamodel>    <state id="a">        <onentry>            <!-- first -1 will be assigned to the datamodel. then, in the same small-step, this will be overridden by the 99 -->            <assign location="x" expr="-1"/>            <assign location="x" expr="99"/>        </onentry>        <!-- in order for this transition to be taken, a must be updated immediately, in the same small-step -->        <transition  event="t" target="b" cond="x === 99">            <assign location="x" expr="x + 1"/>        </transition>    </state>    <state id="b">        <!-- use regular assignment syntax, assuming datamodel variables are in script scope -->        <onentry>            <script>                x *= 2;            </script>        </onentry>        <transition target="c" cond="x === 200"/>        <transition target="f"/>    </state>    <state id="c"/>    <state id="f"/></scxml>
